description: Russia’s largest bank, Sberbank, is preparing to allow Russian citizens to buy and sell digital assets. This move could have far-reaching impacts on the cryptocurrency industry, as well as on other countries that have been critical of cryptocurrencies. title: Mysterious Bitcoin Whale Moves Over $36,000,000 in BTC After Sitting Dormant for 10 Years: On-Chain Data
description:
A mysterious Bitcoin (BTC) whale is on the move, abruptly relocating tens of millions of dollars worth of the crypto king after holding the trove for over a decade. Citing new on-chain data, CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju says that the previously dormant 1,400 BTC worth over $36 million was sent to a Pay-to-Taproot (P2TR) […]

The post Mysterious Bitcoin Whale Moves Over $36,000,000 in BTC After Sitting Dormant for 10 Years: On-Chain Data appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
